I will be travelling in Europe from mid-August to the beginning of September.

Good luck to those of you applying, there are definitely some players who would make terrific moderators!

replies.body: Thanks! and to get emerald, gold and diamond ranks do you have to apply? or do you donate?

replies.body:
Donate.
And remember: You are NOT required to have a donor rank to apply for staff. (Just a reminder because other people have asked this in the past).
